HEALTH_EAT.text: 다현 is 뭔들! (맛있는 거 뭔들 안 어울리겠어!)
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: ダヒョンは何でも似合う！(美味しいもの何でも似合うよ！)
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Dahyun can pull off anything! (She deserves all the delicious food!)

HEALTH_EAT.text: 쩝쩝박사 다현! (맛잘알 다현, 맛있는 거 많이 먹어!)
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: チュプチュプ博士ダヒョン！(美味しいものよく知ってるダヒョン、美味しいものいっぱい食べて！)
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Mukbang Master Dahyun! (You know your food! Eat lots of delicious things!)

HEALTH_EAT.text: 오늘도 다현하세요! (맛있는 거 먹고 행복한 하루 보내세요!)
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: 今日もダヒョンしてください！(美味しいもの食べて幸せな一日を過ごしてください！)
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: "Dahyun" your day! (Eat something delicious and have a happy day!)

HEALTH_EAT.text: 다현 먹방 존버! (다현 먹방 기다릴게요, 맛있는 거 많이 먹어줘!)
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: ダヒョンモッパン、絶対待つ！(ダヒョンのモッパン待ってるよ、美味しいものいっぱい食べてね！)
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Dahyun mukbang, we're holding out! (We're waiting for your mukbang, eat lots of yummy things!)

HEALTH_EAT.text: 두부 is 뭔들! (두부처럼 뽀얀 다현, 맛있는 거 많이 먹고 힘내!)
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: 豆腐は何でも似合う！(豆腐のように白いダヒョン、美味しいものいっぱい食べて元気出して！)
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Tofu is everything! (Dahyun, like tofu, is pure perfection! Eat lots and feel strong!)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: ダヒョン、風邪なんか吹き飛ばせ！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Dahyun, blow away that cold! (A play on Dahyun's nickname "Dubu" - Tofu)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: うちのダヒョン、マンゴーみたいに元気でいて！(ア프지마 - 病まないで、망고-マンゴー)
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Our Dahyun, stay healthy like a mango! (Mango = healthy and delicious, "Don't get sick")

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: ダヒョン、健康な道だけを歩んで！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Dubu baby, only walk the healthy path! (둡깅이 - Dahyun baby, 건강길 - healthy path)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: ダヒョンとTWICEから風邪菌よ、出て行け！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Cold germs, get away from Dahyun and TWICE! (둡와이스 - Dubu + TWICE)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: ダヒョン様、具合が悪くなったらダメですよ！(쓰레기 - ゴミ)
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Dahyun-nim, being sick is trash! (둡님 - Dahyun-sama, 아프면 쓰레기 - if you're sick you're trash, playful saying)

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: 豆腐ちゃん、お疲れ様！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Dahyun-baby, you worked hard! (둡깅 - Dubu-baby, Dubu is a nickname for Dahyun referring to her white skin. Emphasis on cuteness and praise)

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: ドゥブのポテンシャル、レベルMAX！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Dahyun's energy, level MAX! (흥 - Heung, meaning excitement/energy. Man-level = maximum level. Suggests Dahyun's boundless energy even when tired.)

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: 今日も豆腐チャージ満タン！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Dahyun's charm fully charged today too! (둡채력 - Dubu's charm/power. Full charge means fully ready to shine despite hard work)

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: 豆腐リーダー、お疲れ様ドゥブ！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Dubu-leader, you worked hard Dubu! (Adding Dubu at the end is a cute and playful way to emphasize it's for Dahyun, like a stamp of affection. 고생했둡 (gosaenghaedup) is play on 고생했어 (you worked hard) using Dubu's nickname)

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: 豆腐ワイスのおかげで元気が出る！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Thanks to Dubu-TWICE, I feel energized! (Combines Dubu and TWICE, expressing gratitude for Dahyun's hard work and positive impact on the group.)

LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_ja: チェヨン愛してる！
LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_en: I Chaeyoung you! (A play on "사랑해" - I love you, replacing "사랑" with "Chaeyoung")

LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_ja: チェヨンのことなら何でも知ってる！
LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_en: Chaeyoung Expert! (Means someone who knows everything about Chaeyoung)

LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_ja: チェヨン博士
LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_en: Chaeyoung PhD/Dr. Chaeyoung (Implies someone who knows an extreme amount of trivia/facts about Chaeyoung)

LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_ja: 入信否定期は終わった、チェヨンに染まった！
LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_en: I'm past the denial stage, I've completely fallen for Chaeyoung! (입덕 means "entering the fandom," 부정기 means "denial stage," 챙며들었다 is "being permeated/influenced by Chaeyoung")

LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_ja: チェヨンにハマりすぎて骨を埋める！
LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_en: I'm so hooked on Chaeyoung, I'll stay with her forever! (뼈를 묻는다 literally means "burying one's bones," implying staying in a place for a very long time)

LOVE_DEEP.meaning_ja: チェヨンのことなら何でも知ってる！
LOVE_DEEP.meaning_en: Knows Chaeyoung inside and out! (Lit. "Chaeyoung expert")

LOVE_DEEP.meaning_ja: いちご姫チェヨン
LOVE_DEEP.meaning_en: Strawberry Princess Chaeyoung

LOVE_DEEP.meaning_ja: チェヨンと結婚したい！
LOVE_DEEP.meaning_en: I want to marry Chaeyoung! (Hyperbolic love)

LOVE_DEEP.meaning_ja: つまらないチェヨン (でも可愛い)
LOVE_DEEP.meaning_en: No Jam Chaeyoung (But still cute) *This is a playful self-deprecating meme used for Chaeyoung.*

LOVE_DEEP.meaning_ja: チェヨンカソ
LOVE_DEEP.meaning_en: Chaeyoung-casso (referring to her artistic talents like Picasso)

REQ_MARRY.meaning_ja: ソンちゃん愛してる！結婚して！
REQ_MARRY.meaning_en: Chaeyoung, I love you! Marry me!

REQ_MARRY.meaning_ja: チェプリンセス、私の王冠を受け取って！
REQ_MARRY.meaning_en: Chaeyoung Princess, accept my crown (ring)!

REQ_MARRY.meaning_ja: サムムサムム、僕の花嫁！
REQ_MARRY.meaning_en: Ssammu Ssammu, be my bride! (쌈무 is often associated with Chaeyoung's cuteness)

REQ_MARRY.meaning_ja: イチゴ姫、結婚しよう！
REQ_MARRY.meaning_en: Strawberry Princess, let's get married! (Chaeyoung is often associated with strawberries.)

REQ_MARRY.meaning_ja: チェヨン、僕の人生をベッティング！
REQ_MARRY.meaning_en: Chaeyoung, I'm betting my life on you! (Implies serious commitment)

MISS_YOU.meaning_ja: チェヨン恋しいよ(泣)
MISS_YOU.meaning_en: Chaeyoung, I miss you so much (crying)!

MISS_YOU.meaning_ja: チェヨン、私の心に無賃乗車
MISS_YOU.meaning_en: Chaeyoung, you're riding on my heart for free! (You occupy my thoughts)

MISS_YOU.meaning_ja: 챙프リカ会いたくて死にそう
MISS_YOU.meaning_en: Chaeyoung-frica (playful nickname) I miss you to death!

MISS_YOU.meaning_ja: 챙！トッポッキデート、どう？
MISS_YOU.meaning_en: Chaeyoung! Tteokbokki date, what do you say? (Implies wanting to see her)

MISS_YOU.meaning_ja: 챙に会いたすぎてめまいがする
MISS_YOU.meaning_en: I'm so dizzy from missing Chaeyoung!

PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_ja: チェヨンママ (笑)
PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_en: Chaeyoung Mom (LOL, meaning someone who fiercely cares for Chaeyoung)

PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_ja: ダチェン永遠に
PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_en: DubChaeng Forever (Referring to a popular ship between Dahyun and Chaeyoung, forever.)

PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_ja: イチゴチェヨン
PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_en: Strawberry Chaeyoung (Strawberry = Chaeyoung's nickname, so "Strawberry Chaeyoung" implies sweetness & adoration)

PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_ja: チェヨン愛してる
PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_en: Chaeyoung, I love you. (A cute way to express love for Chaeyoung)

PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_ja: ONCEはチェヨン推し
PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_en: ONCE loves Chaeyoung. (Expressing the ONCE fandom's love for Chaeyoung.)

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_ja: チェヨン愛してる！
CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: Chaeyoung, I love you! (Combines Chaeyoung's name with "saranghae," making it a cute, personal declaration of love.)

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_ja: いちご姫
CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: Strawberry Princess (Referring to Chaeyoung's love of strawberries)

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_ja: ダヒョンとチェヨンのケミ最高！
CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: Dahyun & Chaeyoung chemistry is the best! (A cheer about the popular Dahyun & Chaeyoung pairing)

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_ja: チェヨンは何でも最高！
CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: Chaeyoung is perfect no matter what! (Expresses that Chaeyoung looks good in everything)

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_ja: つまらない時期を克服！
CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: Overcome the boring times! (A supportive message for Chaeyoung, telling her to overcome tough times.)

CHEER_UP.meaning_ja: チェヨンのことなら何でも知ってる！
CHEER_UP.meaning_en: Chaeyoung know-it-all (Someone who knows everything about Chaeyoung!)

CHEER_UP.meaning_ja: チェヨン愛してる！
CHEER_UP.meaning_en: I Chaeyoung you! (I love Chaeyoung!) - Play on "Saranghae"

CHEER_UP.meaning_ja: チェヨン可愛い子！
CHEER_UP.meaning_en: Chaeyoung cutie!

CHEER_UP.meaning_ja: いちご姫チェヨン
CHEER_UP.meaning_en: Strawberry Princess Chaeyoung!

CHEER_UP.meaning_ja: チェヨンはマジ最高！
CHEER_UP.meaning_en: So Chaeyoung-like! (Over-the-top Chaeyoung, in a good way)

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_ja: チェヨンのことなら何でも知ってる
PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: Knows Chaeyoung inside and out (a true Chaeyoung expert!)

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_ja: いちご姫
PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: Strawberry Princess (referencing Chaeyoung's love for strawberries)

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_ja: 退屈な街からの脱出
PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: Escape from Boring City (referencing a common joke/meme in kpop)

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_ja: ヒップなチェヨン
PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: Hip Chaeyoung (referencing Chaeyoung's cool and stylish vibe)

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_ja: チェヨンは何でもあり
PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: Chaeyoung can pull off anything (because she's amazing)

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_ja: チェヨンのことなら何でも知ってる (Chaeyong no koto nara nan demo shitteru)

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_ja: チェヨンかわいすぎ (Chaeyong kawaisugi)
PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_en: Chaeyoung is too cute! (expresses extreme cuteness)

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_ja: チェヨン愛してる (Chaeyong aishiteru)
PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_en: Chaeyoung, I love you!

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_ja: チェヨン、アフロディーテみたい (Chaeyong, Afurodiite mitai)
PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_en: Chaeyoung, like Aphrodite (comparing her to a goddess of beauty)

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_ja: 顔面天才チェヨン (Ganmen tensai Chaeyong)
PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_en: Face genius Chaeyoung (praising her visual)

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_ja: チェヨンまた可愛い！
PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: Chaeyoung's cute again! (Expressing she's always cute)

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_ja: 顔面が福祉だ
PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: Her face is welfare (Meaning her beauty is a blessing).

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_ja: チェヨン is 何でも良い
PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: Chaeyoung is good at everything/can pull off anything. (Implying her beauty makes anything look good).

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_ja: チェヨンに染み込む
PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: Falling for Chaeyoung (Getting hooked on her beauty/charm).

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_ja: 人間桜チェヨン
PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: Human Cherry Blossom Chaeyoung (Comparing her beauty to a beautiful cherry blossom).

REQ_HEART.meaning_ja: どんなチェヨンも最高！
REQ_HEART.meaning_en: Everything Chaeyoung does is amazing! (Implying heart-fluttering perfection)

REQ_HEART.meaning_ja: チェヨンニャンはマジ天使！
REQ_HEART.meaning_en: Chaeyoungie-nyang is a total angel! (Referring to her cat-like cuteness and requesting heart with it)

REQ_HEART.meaning_ja: チェヨン、愛されっ子！
REQ_HEART.meaning_en: Chaeyoung, you're such a sweetheart! (Inviting her to show heart to everyone)

REQ_HEART.meaning_ja: 超えられない壁、チェヨン
REQ_HEART.meaning_en: The unbeatable Chaeyoung! (Using her untouchable beauty to request heart pose)

REQ_HEART.meaning_ja: ドキドキさせるチェヨン！
REQ_HEART.meaning_en: Heart-stopping Chaeyoung! (She already stole my heart, but I am requesting finger heart again)

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: ちゃんとおいしいもの食べてね！
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Eat well, Chaeyoung! (Said with affection)

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: ご飯ちゃんと食べてね、チェヨン！
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Make sure you eat your meals, Chaeyoung! (Cute & encouraging)

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: もぐもぐ、おいしいね、チェヨン！
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Yummy yummy good, Chaeyoung! (Focuses on the enjoyment of eating)

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: 甘いものとしょっぱいもの、バランス良く食べてね！
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Get your sweet and savory, Chaeyoung! (Encourages balanced eating)

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: 胃の健康も大事にしてね、チェヨン！
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Take care of your stomach health, Chaeyoung! (Wishes good health and focuses on digestion)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: チェヨンちゃん、風邪なんか吹っ飛ばせ！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Chaeyoung, kick that cold away! (Focuses on Chaeyoung being strong against illness)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: いちご姫、痛くないでマンゴー！(大丈夫だよ！)
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Strawberry Princess, don't be in pain, Mango! (It's okay! / You'll be fine!) (Uses "mang-go" as a pun meaning it's okay)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: チェヨン、花の道だけを歩こう、健康の道もね！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Chaeyoung, walk only on flower paths, and healthy paths too! (Implies wishing her both success and health)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: 私たちのチェヨンペン、風邪モンスターはあっちへ行け！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Our Chaeyoung fan, shoo away the cold monster! (Uses a playful way to banish illness)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: チェヨンニャン、暖かくしてあげるね！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: I'll keep Chaeyoung warm! (Playfully refers to Chaeyoung as "cat" and expresses care for her well-being)

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: 챙깅、お疲れ様！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Chaeyoungie, you worked hard! (Uses "Chaengging," a nickname for Chaeyoung, for extra cuteness.)

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: イチゴ姫、最高！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Strawberry Princess, you're the best! (Highlights Chaeyoung's love for strawberries.)

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: ちゃんとチェヨンを知ってる、今日も輝いてる！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: You know Chaeyoung well, shining brightly today! (This plays on fans who know Chaeyoung inside and out, and praises her shine.)

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: 今日もチェヨン！明日もチェヨン！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Chaeyoung today! Chaeyoung tomorrow! (Simple and repetitive, a common cheering style in K-pop)

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: チェヨンが一番！お疲れ様！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Chaeyoung is the best! You worked hard! (A straightforward compliment with an added "Chaeng" for flair)

LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_ja: 쯔뭉이なら何でも良い
LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_en: Tzuyu is perfect no matter what she does. (Expressing love and acceptance of everything Tzuyu does. "뭔들" implies that everything is good because it's her.)

LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_ja: 쯔ウィにハマる
LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_en: To slowly fall for Tzuyu. (Describing the gradual process of becoming a Tzuyu fan.)

LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_ja: 入徳否定期はツウィの前では無用
LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_en: Denial of being a fan is useless in front of Tzuyu. (Humorously suggesting Tzuyu is so captivating, resisting fandom is impossible.)

LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_ja: 顔が福祉だ、ツウィ！
LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_en: Your face is welfare, Tzuyu! (Meaning Tzuyu's beauty is so incredible, it brings happiness and good fortune like welfare benefits.)

LOVE_GENERAL.text: 쯔위 때문에 내 심장이 endangered species
LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_ja: ツウィのせいで私の心臓は絶滅危惧種
LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_en: Tzuyu makes my heart an endangered species. (Hyperbolically stating that Tzuyu's beauty is so overwhelming, it's putting your heart at risk.)

LOVE_DEEP.meaning_ja: ダブチェン、私チェン！(愛してるよ！)
LOVE_DEEP.meaning_en: Dubu Chaeyoung, I love Chaeyoung! (Implies loving Tzuyu in the same way someone loves Dahyun and Chaeyoung - deep affection)

LOVE_DEEP.meaning_ja: 쯔뭉が最高！(愛してる!)
LOVE_DEEP.meaning_en: Tzuyu-moongi is the best! (I love her!) (Tzuyu-moongi is a nickname combining Tzuyu and 'moongchi' meaning soft/fluffy)

LOVE_DEEP.meaning_ja: ツウィは何でも最高！(愛してるからね!)
LOVE_DEEP.meaning_en: Tzuyu is perfect no matter what! (Because I love you!) (Means Tzuyu is good no matter what she does.)

LOVE_DEEP.meaning_ja: 今日から1日、ツウィにハマる！(大好き！)
LOVE_DEEP.meaning_en: Day 1 of falling for Tzuyu! (I love her!) (Emphasizes a renewed or deepening love for Tzuyu.)

LOVE_DEEP.meaning_ja: ツウィレルヤ！(愛してる、神！)
LOVE_DEEP.meaning_en: Tzuyu-lujah! (I love you, God!) (Playful expression combining Tzuyu's name with 'Hallelujah' to express intense joy and adoration.)

REQ_MARRY.meaning_ja: チュウィと結婚してくれ (onegai)
REQ_MARRY.meaning_en: Tzuyu, please marry me (I'm begging you)!

REQ_MARRY.meaning_ja: チュウィにハマって私の人生責任取って
REQ_MARRY.meaning_en: I've fallen for Tzuyu, take responsibility for my life! (A playful way of saying you're devoted)

REQ_MARRY.meaning_ja: 顔が福祉だ、ツウィ
REQ_MARRY.meaning_en: Tzuyu's face is welfare (her beauty is a blessing)!

REQ_MARRY.meaning_ja: 쯔뭉이 は何でも良い
REQ_MARRY.meaning_en: Anything Tzuyu does is great (Tzuyu is perfect no matter what)!

REQ_MARRY.meaning_ja: ツウィ愛してる！私の心臓もってって
REQ_MARRY.meaning_en: I love Tzuyu! Take my heart!

MISS_YOU.text: 쯔뭉 보고 싶다! (Tzuyu mung bogo shipda!)
MISS_YOU.meaning_ja: ツウィ餅会いたい！(Tzuyu mochi aitai!)
MISS_YOU.meaning_en: I miss Tzuyu (like a soft, cute rice cake)! (Emphasizes Tzuyu's cuteness & the longing to see her)

MISS_YOU.meaning_ja: ツウィに染み込む… (Tzuyu ni shimi komu…)
MISS_YOU.meaning_en: I'm becoming imbued/absorbed with Tzuyu… (Implies falling deeply for Tzuyu & wanting her presence.)

MISS_YOU.meaning_ja: 私の心臓、ツウィキュン！(Watashi no shinzou, Tzuyu-kyun!)
MISS_YOU.meaning_en: My heart goes 'Tzuyu-kung'! (Expresses the heart flutter when thinking of Tzuyu, mimicking the sound of a heartbeat.)

MISS_YOU.meaning_ja: ツウィに会いたくて震える (Tzuyu ni aitakute furueru)
MISS_YOU.meaning_en: I'm trembling with how much I want to see Tzuyu! (Exaggerated expression of missing someone intensely. The "go" adds a cute/playful feel.)

MISS_YOU.meaning_ja: 人生はツウィ (Jinsei wa Tzuyu)
MISS_YOU.meaning_en: Life is Tzuyu (Expresses that Tzuyu makes life better, and that life isn't as fulfilling without her)

PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_ja: 愛してるよ、本当に！ツウィ
PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_en: Love you so much, Tzuyu! (Emphasizing enduring affection)

PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_ja: ツウィに染み込むように永遠に
PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_en: To be forever permeated by Tzuyu (Implying a lasting influence)

PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_ja: ツウィたん、花の道だけを歩んでね
PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_en: Tzuyu-baby, only walk the flower path (Wishing her only good things forever)

PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_ja: 私の心にツウィが着席！永遠に！
PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_en: Tzuyu is settled in my heart! Forever! (Expressing a permanent place in the fan's heart)

PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_ja: ツウィ、愛しい子、永遠に
PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_en: Tzuyu, my precious darling, forever! (A term of endearment with the "forever" promise)

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_ja: 쯔뭉이 最高！ (쯔뭉이 さいこう！)
CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: Tzuyu-moong is the best! (Expressing immense admiration, "moong" adds cuteness.)

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_ja: ダブツ 永遠に！ (Dabutsu eien ni!)
CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: DubTzu Forever! (Referencing the Dahyun/Tzuyu ship, meaning 'forever')

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_ja: Tzuyu 花道だけを歩いて！(Tzuyu hanamichi dake o aruite!)
CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: Tzuyu, only walk the flower path! (Wishing her success and happiness in her career.)

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_ja: ツウィは何でも！ (Tzuyu wa nandemo!)
CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: Tzuyu is good at everything! / Tzuyu makes anything work! (Expressing that she excels at anything she tries.)

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_ja: 私の心の中にツウィ保存！ (Watashi no kokoro no naka ni Tzuyu hozon!)
CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: Tzuyu, saved in my heart! (Expressing how loved she is).

CHEER_UP.meaning_ja: 쯔뭉이 最高！(マジ最高！)
CHEER_UP.meaning_en: Tzuyu is the best! (Seriously the best!)

CHEER_UP.meaning_ja: サナなしでは生きられない、ツウィなしでは生きられない
CHEER_UP.meaning_en: Without Sana, it's pointless to live. I can't live without Tzuyu. (Play on a viral phrase)

CHEER_UP.meaning_ja: ツウィは何でもアリ(最高)
CHEER_UP.meaning_en: Tzuyu can pull off anything (is amazing).

CHEER_UP.meaning_ja: 쯔ギちゃん、花の道だけを歩んで！
CHEER_UP.meaning_en: Tzuyu, walk only on flower paths! (Wishing only good things)

CHEER_UP.meaning_ja: 쯔ウィにハマる
CHEER_UP.meaning_en: To slowly fall for Tzuyu (becoming more and more of a fan)

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_ja: ツウィ様マジ神
PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: Tzuyu-sama is truly a god!

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_ja: 美貌が国宝級
PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: Her beauty is a national treasure!

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_ja: 顔面が福祉だ
PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: Her face is welfare/a blessing!

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_ja: ステージを破った
PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: She slayed the stage! (lit. Tore up the stage)

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_ja: 入徳否定はない
PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: There's no denying becoming a fan! (lit. There's no denying entering fandom)

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_ja: ツウィ餅 (可愛い)
PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_en: Tzuyu Mochi (So Cute)

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_ja: 神ツウィ (最高)
PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_en: God Tzuyu (The Best)

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_ja: 顔面が福祉 (国宝級)
PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_en: Her face is welfare (National Treasure Level)

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_ja: ツウィに染まる (ハマる)
PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_en: To Tzuyu-permeate (To fall for Tzuyu)

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_ja: ツウィ + デビッド (彫刻美)
PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_en: Tzuyu + David (Sculptural Beauty)

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_ja: ツウィちゃんは何でも最高
PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: Tzuyu is perfect no matter what (she does/wears)!

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_ja: 顔面が福祉
PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: Her face is welfare (meaning it brings happiness and good fortune).

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_ja: ビジュアル天才、満載、ゴッド・ツウィ
PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: Visual genius, overflowing, God Tzuyu (a term of high praise).

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_ja: ツウィちゃんは何でも可愛いに決まってる
PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: What wouldn't be beautiful on Tzuyu? (Implies everything looks good on her).

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_ja: 人生はツウィみたいに
PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: Life should be like Tzuyu (meaning beautiful and blessed).

REQ_HEART.meaning_ja: ツウィたんかわいすぎ
REQ_HEART.meaning_en: Tzuyu is too cute!

REQ_HEART.meaning_ja: シャシャシャ (可愛さ爆発)
REQ_HEART.meaning_en: Shya Shya Shya (bursting with cuteness)

REQ_HEART.meaning_ja: ダヒョン、チェヨン、ツウィ最高
REQ_HEART.meaning_en: Dahyun, Chaeyoung, Tzuyu are the best!

REQ_HEART.meaning_ja: Onceで幸せ
REQ_HEART.meaning_en: Happy to be a ONCE

REQ_HEART.meaning_ja: 私たちのわんこ (可愛い子)
REQ_HEART.meaning_en: Our puppy (cute person)

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: ツウィたん、美味しいものだけ食べてね！
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Tzuyu, only walk the path where good food is! (Meaning: Only good things, especially delicious food, should come your way!)

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: 食べるツウィ、健康なツウィ！
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Eating Tzuyu, Healthy Tzuyu! (Meaning: We want to see you eat well and stay healthy!)

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: お腹すかせないでね、ツウィ！
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Don't go hungry, Tzuyu!

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: TWICE、ご飯ちゃんと食べてね！
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: TWICE, please take care of your meals! (Meaning indirectly focusing on Tzuyu with the wider group in mind)

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_ja: 餃子の道だけ歩いて、ツウィ！
HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Only walk the path of dumplings, Tzuyu! (Playful and refers to her love of dumplings)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: ツウィちゃん、風邪に気をつけてね！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Tzuyu-ah, be careful not to catch a cold! (쯔뭉이 - Tzuyu nickname)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: チェンツ、健康な道だけを歩もう！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: ChaengTzu, let's only walk the healthy path! (챙쯔 - Chaeyoung & Tzuyu ship name)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: ONCEの風邪、すぐ治れ！ツウィパワー！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: ONCE, get well soon! Tzuyu power! (뚝 - sudden stop, slang for getting better quickly)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: 病気にならないでマンゴー、ツウィ！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Don't get sick, Mango Tzuyu! (아프지망고 - Play on "Don't be sick" + Mango, Tzuyu's favorite fruit)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_ja: ツウィを見て元気出して風邪を追い払おう！
HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Look at Tzuyu, get energized, and chase away the cold! (훠이훠이 - onomatopoeia for shooing something away)

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: ツウィちゃんマジ最高！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Tzuyu is seriously the best!

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: ダヒョン、チェヨン、ナヨンしか勝たん！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Dahyun, Chaeyoung, Nayeon are the only ones that matter! (Used playfully to emphasize one's bias, but can be adapted to "쯔위가 최고! - Tzuyu is the best!")

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: ツウィを推すのが私の力！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Stanning Tzuyu is my strength!

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: 今日もツウィパワー！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Tzuyu power today too!

GREET_JOB.meaning_ja: ツウィなしじゃ生きられない！
GREET_JOB.meaning_en: I can't live without Tzuyu!
